alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Garland; Hot Spring; Lonoke; Pulaski; Saline; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 6:47PM CDT until April 15 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LONOKE...SOUTHERN FAULKNER...SOUTHWESTERN WHITE... EAST CENTRAL GARLAND...CENTRAL SALINE...NORTHEASTERN HOT SPRING AND PULASKI COUNTIES... At 646 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mount Vernon to 6 miles northwest of Olmstead to 6 miles southwest of Chenal Valley to near Lonsdale, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Benton... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Cabot... Searcy... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... North Little Rock Airport... Little Rock AFB... Southwest Little Rock... Beebe... Ward... Haskell... Vilonia... Shannon Hills... Mayflower... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Little Rock.

area.areaDesc: Faulkner; Garland; Hot Spring; Lonoke; Pulaski; Saline; White
